object_error_summary.message:
Dataset schema (gmx.xsd) Validation Error:
Element '{http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}MD_Keywords': Missing child element(s). Expected is ( {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}keyword ).
Element '{http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}resourceConstraints': This element is not expected. Expected is one of ( {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}spatialRepresentationType, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}spatialResolution, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}language ).
Error importing Gemini document: Validation Error: {'Spatial': u'Error decoding JSON object: Expecting value: line 1 column 81 (char 80)'}

Error Message: "Unique resource identifier is mandatory for datasets and series. One or more shall be provided."  Error Location: "/*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='identificationInfo' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='MD_DataIdentification' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='citation' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='CI_Citation' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']"  Error Assert: "((../../../../gmd:hierarchyLevel[1]/*[1]/@codeListValue = 'dataset' or ../../../../gmd:hierarchyLevel[1]/*[1]/@codeListValue = 'series') and count(gmd:identifier) >= 1) or (../../../../gmd:hierarchyLevel[1]/*[1]/@codeListValue != 'dataset' and ../../../../gmd:hierarchyLevel[1]/*[1]/@codeListValue != 'series') or count(../../../../gmd:hierarchyLevel) = 0":

Service schemas (gmx.xsd & srv.xsd) Validation Error:
Element '{http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}MD_LegalConstraints': This element is not expected. Expected is one of ( {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}pointOfContact, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}resourceMaintenance, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}graphicOverview, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}resourceFormat, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}descriptiveKeywords, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}resourceSpecificUsage, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}resourceConstraints, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd}aggregationInfo, {http://www.isotc211.org/2005/srv}serviceType ).
WMS check for http://inspire.wychavon.gov.uk:80/geoserver/wychavon/ows?SERVICE=WMS& failed with exception: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'find'
